## WindowFullscreenProperty class

窗口进入全屏状态的属性对象  module:WindowManager

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export class WindowFullscreenProperty 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [follow](./extractor.windowfullscreenproperty.follow.md) |  | boolean | 设置为true时以follow模式进入全屏状态，进入全屏状态后头部位置和旋转锁定为设置值  { boolean } |
|  [headPosition](./extractor.windowfullscreenproperty.headposition.md) |  | [Vector3f](./extractor.vector3f.md) | 进入全屏状态时的初始头部位置  { module:Common.Vector3f } |
|  [headRotation](./extractor.windowfullscreenproperty.headrotation.md) |  | [Quaternion](./extractor.quaternion.md) | 进入全屏状态时的初始头部旋转  { module:Common.Quaternion } |
